description: This trap is to communicate a couple of things about
the completion of a file transfer.
devFileXferStatus - Did it complete successfully or not.
devFileXferErrorStatus - If not, what was the error code.
devFileXferOperation - What operation was performed?.
devFileXferFileType - Was it a firmware xfer or config?
devFileXferFileName - The name of the file transfered.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 3) ? 'Transfer ($v3) status for $v4 file $v5 : $v1 (error code: $v2)' : 'Transfer ($v3) status for $v4 file $v5 : $v1'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferEvent PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferStatus i 1 PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferErrorStatus i 9999 PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferOperation i 1 PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferFileType i 1 PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferFileName s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains the status of the file transfer.
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferStatus

description: This object contains the reason code of the failure determined in
devFileXferStatus.
The reason code are specific to the file transfer protocol.
Please refer to the file transfer protocols respective RFC for
clarification
of the error code value meanings.
TFTP Error Codes from rfc 1350
FTP Error Codes from rfc 959
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferErrorStatus

description: This object contains the operation the file transfer wants to
perform.
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferOperation

description: Specifies the type of file your want to transfer.
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferFileType

description: This object contains the name of the filetransfer file.
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devFileXferFileName

description: This trap indicates a condition exists, which prevents
automated backup of a device's configuration to the
Management Controller Card (MCC) Flash File System at a
scheduled time.
The index for this entry.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalIndex

description: This trap is sent by a device to indicate that an incorrect
or incompatible configuration file is being downloaded to the
device from the MCC Flash File System.

event.Summary: Incompatible configuration file is being downloaded

description: The index for this entry.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalIndex

description: This trap is to communicate the result of the Auto Firmware Download.
The variable binding for this trap would be the devAutoFwStatus
of pdnAutoFwGroup. The exact format of this display string will
be well-documented.
This indicates the Status of Auto Firmware Download
where each field is separated by a semi-colon.
The get function will return the status of the latest
card downloaded.
variables.name: PDN-CONTROL-MIB::devAutoFwStatus

description: This trap is to communicate a couple of things about
the completion of a file transfer.
pdnDevFileXferStatus - Did it complete successfully or not.
pdnDevFileXferErrorStatus - If not, what was the error code.
pdnDevFileXferOperation - What operation was performed?.
pdnDevFileXferFileType - Was it a firmware xfer or config?
pdnDevFileXferFileName - The name of the file transfered.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 3) ? 'Transfer ($v3) status for $v4 file $v5 : $v1 (error code: $v2)' : 'Transfer ($v3) status for $v4 file $v5 : $v1'
